title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 November 2011 - XWiki
content:
09:07 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <+mflorea> Good morning guys. Who's in for the Build Manager role this week?  
09:19 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:20 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:21 <+mflorea> one of cjdelisle, tmortagne and Enygma` based on the count shown on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BuildManagerRoster  
09:23 <+tmortagne> mflorea: will take care of it  
09:23 <+mflorea> great, thanks  
09:29 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <+tmortagne> vmassol: there is a test failing on LinkCheckerTransformationTest  
09:32 <+tmortagne> and good morning :)  
09:35 <vmassol> tmortagne: ok thanks. It's a flicker. I tried to fix it yesterday but so far I've failed to nail it  
09:35 <+tmortagne> ok  
09:36 <vmassol> must be some issue with threads somehow  
09:42 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
09:44 <vmassol> has quit  
09:52 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rf7c40ac / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-linkchecker/src/test/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/linkchecker/LinkCheckerTransformationTest.java :  
09:52 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7130: Add ability to get IRC notifications when detecting broken external links in the wiki  
09:53 <CIA-102> \* Exclude test till I find out why it's flickering - http://git.io/RF1TKA  
10:11 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* r1603196 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditSheet.xml : (log message trimmed)  
10:12 <CIA-102> AppWithinMinutes/ClassEditor: Don't display the 'hint' and 'required'  
10:12 <CIA-102> properties. They have to be added to the PropertyMetaClass in order to be  
10:12 <CIA-102> Marius Dumitru Florea feature-applicationWithinMinutes \* rd202e12 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-appwithinminutes/src/main/resources/AppWithinMinutes/WebHome.xml : AppWithinMinutes: Add a blank (for now) home page. - http://git.io/CPqB\_A  
10:12 <vmassol1> guys I need to work on something urgent for a customer. Who could take over and check xwiki.org is going down every hour or so?  
10:12 <vmassol1> tmortagne: ?  
10:13 <+tmortagne> vmassol1: not sure I have a user on xwiki.org actually  
10:13 <vmassol1> tmortagne: you can ask alex  
10:14 <+tmortagne> will check  
10:14 <vmassol1> thanks  
10:15 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:31 <+tmortagne> vmassol1: for what did you wanted to use EM on xwiki.org some time ago ? Looks like it's working well now  
10:31 <vmassol1> tmortagne: hmm I don't remember  
10:32 <+tmortagne> you wanted to get some core extension but I don't remember why exactly  
10:34 <+tmortagne> hmm I get lots of error like http://pastebin.com/iRW0Nvqc  
10:37 <vmassol1> mflorea: I don't think that's important  
10:37 <vmassol1> it's simple a socket closed by the client side

16:32 <CIA-102> tmortagne master \* r3258cb1 / (4 files): XWIKI-7114: Improve XWiki Repository UI ...  
16:38 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
16:46 <evalica> has quit  
16:50 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
16:53 <vmassol1> XWiki Development Team?  
16:54 <vmassol> has quit  
16:59 <tmortagne> vmassol1: sound better, do we have something in commons pom ?  
16:59 <tmortagne> (if not we should)  
16:59 <vmassol1> wdym?  
16:59 <tmortagne> author  
16:59 <tmortagne> in maven pom.xml  
17:00 <tmortagne> checking  
17:00 <tmortagne> we don't have anything itt seems  
17:00 <vmassol1> not sure what you mean  
17:01 <vmassol1> are you asking if committers are listed in the pom?  
17:01 <tmortagne> I means providing the <authors> information in the pom  
17:01 <vmassol1> I've put a generic entry pointing to the hall of fame in the top level pom if that's what you're asking  
17:01 <tmortagne> can't find it  
17:01 <vmassol1> for the record it was needed for publishing on maven central  
17:01 <tmortagne> ha was looking at the other pom  
17:02 <tmortagne> we should use the same name on extensions.xwiki.org I think  
17:03 <tmortagne> so that the same author appear if you get your extension from maven repository or from extensions.xwiki.org  
17:03 <tmortagne> I mean in Extension Manager  
17:03 <tmortagne> it's "All XWiki Developers" on commons  
17:03 <tmortagne> vmassol1: are you ok with it or do you want to change the commons one for "XWiki Development Team" ?  
17:04 <vmassol1> not sure why you want to change it  
17:04 <vmassol1> I'm missing something  
17:04 <tmortagne> "(05:03:18 PM) tmortagne: so that the same author appear if you get your extension from maven repository or from extensions.xwiki.org"  
17:04 <vmassol1> oh missed the few lines above  
17:04 <vmassol1> ah so EM uses the author info from the pom?  
17:05 <vmassol1> yes we can change it to XWiki Development Team in the top level pom, that's fine  
17:05 <tmortagne> well it has to get it somewhere  
17:05 <+sburjan> I have an issue with the cache macro. more than 5 minues have passed and I still have the old content cached.  
17:05 <tmortagne> EM is getting every information it can get from the pom.xml  
17:06 <tmortagne> sburjan: that's because it require more that 5 minute since the last time it has been viewed  
17:06 <+sburjan> oh, ok :) I was refreshing a lot in the past 5 minutes :)  
17:06 <cjdelisle> has quit  
17:06 <+sburjan> thanks :)
